# truenas_virt_instance (Resource)

Manages an Incus/LXC container on TrueNAS 25.0+.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `image_name` (String) Container image name (e.g., 'ubuntu').
- `image_version` (String) Container image version (e.g., '24.04').
- `name` (String) Container name.
- `storage_pool` (String) Storage pool for the container.

### Optional

- `autostart` (Boolean) Whether to start the container automatically on boot. Defaults to false.
- `desired_state` (String) Desired container state: 'RUNNING' or 'STOPPED'. Defaults to 'RUNNING'.
- `disk` (Block List) Disk devices to attach to the container. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedblock--disk))
- `nic` (Block List) Network interfaces to attach to the container. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedblock--nic))
- `proxy` (Block List) Port proxies/forwards for the container. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedblock--proxy))
- `shutdown_timeout` (Number) Timeout in seconds for graceful shutdown. Defaults to 30.
- `state_timeout` (Number) Timeout in seconds to wait for state transitions. Defaults to 90. Range: 30-600.

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) Container ID (numeric).
- `state` (String) Current container state (RUNNING, STOPPED, etc.).
- `uuid` (String) Container UUID.

<a id="nestedblock--disk"></a>
### Nested Schema for `disk`

Required:

- `destination` (String) Mount point inside the container (e.g., '/data').
- `source` (String) Source path on the host (e.g., '/mnt/tank/data').

Optional:

- `name` (String) Device name (auto-generated if not specified).
- `readonly` (Boolean) Mount as read-only. Defaults to false.


<a id="nestedblock--nic"></a>
### Nested Schema for `nic`

Optional:

- `name` (String) Device name (auto-generated if not specified).
- `network` (String) Network name to attach to.
- `nic_type` (String) NIC type: 'BRIDGED' or 'MACVLAN'.
- `parent` (String) Parent interface name.


<a id="nestedblock--proxy"></a>
### Nested Schema for `proxy`

Required:

- `dest_port` (Number) Destination port in the container.
- `dest_proto` (String) Destination protocol: 'TCP' or 'UDP'.
- `source_port` (Number) Source port on the host.
- `source_proto` (String) Source protocol: 'TCP' or 'UDP'.

Optional:

- `name` (String) Device name (auto-generated if not specified).
